name: Nudge from RTL
description: Quickly resize a layer horizontally from right to left with keyboard shortcuts
author: Kevin Gutowski

commands.name: Expand horizontally RTL
commands.description: Expand current layer horizontally from top right.

commands.name: Compress horizontally RTL
commands.description: Compress current layer horizontally from top right.

commands.name: Expand horizontally RTL (largeNudge)
commands.description: Expand current layer horizontally from top right - by a large amount.

commands.name: Compress horizontally RTL (largeNudge)
commands.description: Expand current layer horizontally from top right - by a large amount.
